select last_insert_id()
INSERT INTO business_detail ( merchant_no, terminal, clear_date, trade_date, trade_card_no, index_no, trade_channel, trade_amount, discount_amount, real_amount, trade_type, product_info, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, bak7, bak8 ) VALUES ( #{merchantNo}, #{terminal}, #{clearDate}, #{tradeDate}, #{tradeCardNo}, #{indexNo}, #{tradeChannel}, #{tradeAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{realAmount}, #{tradeType}, #{productInfo}, #{bak1}, #{bak2}, #{bak3}, #{bak4}, #{bak5}, #{bak6}, #{bak7}, #{bak8} )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into business_detail () values
( #{item.merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idCardExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.depotCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.depotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.depotFloor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.depotDoor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

UPDATE business_detail merchant_no = #{merchantNo} , terminal = #{terminal} , clear_date = #{clearDate} , trade_date = #{tradeDate} , trade_card_no = #{tradeCardNo} , index_no = #{indexNo} , trade_channel = #{tradeChannel} , trade_amount = #{tradeAmount} , discount_amount = #{discountAmount} , real_amount = #{realAmount} , trade_type = #{tradeType} , product_info = #{productInfo} , bak1 = #{bak1} , bak2 = #{bak2} , bak3 = #{bak3} , bak4 = #{bak4} , bak5 = #{bak5} , bak6 = #{bak6} , bak7 = #{bak7} , bak8 = #{bak8}
WHERE id = #{id}
